Name: Rock 'n Shock
Desc:
Installs up to 3 to create a which continuously attacks enemies. Tesla Coils self-destruct when they run out of power.
If there are no Tesla Coils installed or enough space to install 3 at once, you can install three Tesla Coils at once using the down arrow key.
When Rock 'n Shock is in effect, attempting to install a new Tesla Coil will remove all 3 existing Tesla Coils before proceeding to install.

H.Old: MP Cost: 75. When 3 Tesla Coils are installed, creates a Rock 'n Shock for 70 sec. Attacks up to 10 enemies within range at 200% Damage and Stuns them. After its duration, self-destructs at 550% Damage.
H.New:
MP Cost: 75. When 3 Tesla Coils are installed, creates a Rock 'n Shock for 70 sec.
Periodically attacks up to 10 enemies within range at 200% Damage. Successful attacks Stun enemies. Upon expiration, explodes and attacks up to 6 enemies at 550% Damage.
